product_overview: The Kiran Regmi Portfolio is a professional and responsive personal website designed to showcase Kiran Regmi's skills, projects, and contact information. It serves as a digital resume highlighting expertise in web and mobile development using modern technologies, aimed at attracting employers and clients.
core_goals: Create a professional online presence to showcase skills, projects, and experience.
Provide an intuitive and fully responsive design for seamless access across devices.
Enable potential employers and clients to easily learn about Kiran's background and technical competencies.
Offer direct communication via a contact form integrated with Firebase.
Support project exploration with detailed descriptions, technology stacks, and live demos or links.
Facilitate resume download for potential employers.
key_features: Home page with introduction, smooth navigation, and call-to-action buttons.
About section detailing background, education, and experience.
Skills section highlighting key technologies and technical competencies.
Projects section with project cards, live demo via an interactive mobile emulator, and GitHub links.
Contact section with a contact form for direct messaging.
Resume section allowing download of the CV.
Fully responsive design supporting desktop and mobile devices.
Dark/light theme toggle functionality using localStorage.
Interactive mobile phone emulator with integrated apps like Camera, Photos, Play Store, Settings, Clock, and more.
Firebase integration for backend services including contact form handling.
user_flow_summary: User lands on Home page and is greeted with an introduction and calls to action.
User navigates to About section to learn about background and experience.
User explores Skills section to view key technical competencies.
User visits Projects section to see showcased projects with live demos and external links.
User interacts with the Contact section to send a message through the integrated form.
User accesses Resume section to download CV for offline use.
validation_criteria: The portfolio website must be fully responsive and visually consistent across devices and browsers.
All navigation links and buttons work correctly with smooth scrolling and theme toggling.
The mobile emulator and its integrated apps function interactively and as intended.
The contact form successfully sends messages, storing data securely via Firebase.
Resume download link is functional and provides the correct file.
Dark/light theme toggle persists user preference across sessions using localStorage.
Projects display accurately with correct descriptions, images, and links.
